title: Oliva Pizzeria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizza place opened Jan 2015 in Bellavista. Offers a separate vegan menu with pizza, sandwiches, salads, desserts. Has a vegan lunch menu. the vegan pizzas have plant-based cheese and meat, and unusual choices such as a Mexican-inspired pizza with beans and guacamole. Keeps designated vegan area and cookware in the kitchen.
